a pity.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used to show that you are disappointed about something and you wish things could happen differently
a pity.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: It’s a pity that he didn’t accept the job.
It’s a great pity Joyce wasn’t invited.
I like Charlie. Pity he had to marry that awful woman.
A pity we can’t find the guy who did it.
It would be a pity to give up now – you’ve nearly finished.
it’s a pity to do something
